name: Nomad (itch) (rberens)
description:
Nomad is the story of a traveler who has been left behind by his friends on a mountain during a storm. He must find his friends before he dies on the mountaintop.

CONTROLS:

[A]: Move Left

[D]: Move Right

[SPACE]: Jump

[L SHIFT]: Sprint

[ENTER]: Progress Dialogue/Start Game

[ESCAPE]: Exit Game
